Enables pinch-to-zoom and rotation gestures in command panel mode, but uses more data and memory. Off by default (loads 1920px resolution).
Supported: TXT, MD, LOG, JSON, XML, CSV
Controls hidden. Swipe up to show.
Download and generate thumbnails for large PDF files: up to 50 MB for SMB, up to 10 MB for S/FTP/Cloud (may take significant time)
Play video/audio in slideshow to end
Hide quick action buttons on thumbnails
Show touch zones hint on first run
Display touch zones overlay when opening player for the first time
Display semi-transparent touch zones grid over media in fullscreen mode
Touch zones hint will be shown next time you open media player
Extract and display first frame for video files (may take 2+ seconds for network files)
Touch Zones Scheme (Images/Video) for full screen mode
Go to next file after copying
Up to 30 quick sort folders. Each has a color and number.
Quick Sort List for Sorting Commands
Add the folders first at the main screen, before mark any for quick sort.
Leave empty to auto-generate from path
Enable to search for media files in all nested subdirectories. Disable to scan only the root folder.
Show only file extension icons (no image/video preview). Auto-enabled for folders with >10000 files.
This will permanently delete %d trash folder(s) and all files inside them. This action cannot be undone.

Google Drive connection needs to be restored.

Please:
1. Go to Main Menu
2. Open 'Resources'
3. Tap on "%1$s"
4. Sign in with your Google account
To access \"%1$s\", you need to sign in with your Google account.
Google Drive authentication required.\n\nPlease go to Resources and sign in to this Cloud resource.
Server and Share Name are required
To apply the new language (%1$s), the application needs to restart. Continue?
To apply the new cache size (%1$d MB), the application needs to restart. Continue?
Request timed out. Please check your internet connection and try again.
Cannot connect to \"%1$s\" - authentication failed.\n\nCheck username and password.
Cannot connect to \"%1$s\" - access denied.\n\nCheck share permissions.
Cannot connect to \"%1$s\" - share not found.\n\nVerify share name on server.

Organize your media files efficiently:

‚Ä¢ Browse photos, videos, GIFs, and audio
‚Ä¢ Sort and filter by name, date, or size
‚Ä¢ Copy/move with touch gestures
‚Ä¢ Local, network (SMB/S/FTP), and cloud storage
‚Ä¢ Up to 30 quick destination folders
‚Ä¢ Slideshow mode

Let's get started!

Supported resource types:

üì± LOCAL: Device storage, SD cards

üåê NETWORK: SMB/CIFS, SFTP, FTP

‚òÅÔ∏è CLOUD: Google Drive, OneDrive, Dropbox

Add resources in Settings!
Touch Zones (Images/Video)\nuse in full screen view mode
Player uses 9 touch zones (3√ó3 grid) for quick actions. Tap zones to navigate, copy, move, delete files, or access the command panel. See the scheme above for details.

RESOURCES: Add folders from local storage, network shares, or cloud services.

DESTINATIONS: Set up to 30 quick-access folders with color coding for fast copy/move operations.

Configure in Settings anytime!
FastMediaSorter needs access to your device storage to scan and display media files.
FastMediaSorter needs permission to manage all files on your device to access local folders and media files.
FastMediaSorter needs network access to connect to SMB/SFTP shares and cloud storage.

Recommended cache size: %1$d MB

Storage info:
%2$s

Apply this setting?

Based on your device storage, we recommend cache size: %1$d MB

Storage info:
%2$s

Would you like to apply this setting?
Auto-advance time for images in slideshow mode. Range: 1-3600 seconds. Video files play to end or respect this timer based on settings.
Thumbnail size in pixels for grid view. Default: 96dp. Range: 32-256dp (increments of 8dp).
Quick sort targets for fast file organization. Maximum 30 destinations. Each has a number and color for easy identification.

9 invisible zones (3√ó3 grid) for gesture control in fullscreen mode. Left/Center/Right and Top/Middle/Bottom combinations trigger different actions like navigation, file operations, and panel control.
Confirm before destructive operations. When enabled, app asks for confirmation before deleting or moving files to prevent accidental data loss.

Export all animation frames as separate PNG files to Downloads folder. Each frame will be saved as: [filename]_frame_001.png, [filename]_frame_002.png, etc.
Adjust delay between frames to speed up or slow down the animation. Original file will be overwritten with new speed. Range: 0.25x (4√ó slower) to 4x (4√ó faster).
Extract the first frame of the animation and save it as a static PNG image in Downloads folder. Filename: [original_name]_first_frame.png
Speed changed to %1$.1fx, saved to Downloads

To play this file with external player, copy it to a local resource first.
Format not supported. Try opening with external player.
Format not supported. Copy file to local resource to use external player.
Authentication failed. Please check your username and password in resource settings.
Access denied. You may not have permission to access this file or folder.
File or folder not found. It may have been moved or deleted.
A file with this name already exists in the destination.
Network connection problem. Check your internet/Wi-Fi connection.
Operation timed out. The server may be slow or unavailable.
Not enough disk space on the destination.
The file or folder is read-only and cannot be modified.
Invalid file name. It may contain forbidden characters.
